definition: to get rid of/to put aside/to reject/to keep control/to hold (one's breath)

sentences.english: The gloves are made of lambswool which means that they won’t scratch your display.
sentences.chinese: 此手套用羔羊毛製作，所以不會劃傷顯示屏。

sentences.english: Silhouettes flashed on Lash's display, confirming Yang's analysis.
sentences.chinese: 雷達側影在拉稀的顯示屏上閃爍，證實了楊的分析。

sentences.english: I can confirm that I like the F60 more than last year's car.
sentences.chinese: 我可以證實，我喜歡比去年的賽車更多的液晶顯示屏。

sentences.english: "Nothing, sir, " Yang answered as he pored over the data flashing on his screens.
sentences.chinese: “沒有異常，長官，”楊凝視着閃爍的顯示屏說道。

sentences.english: I decided to switch back to my newer computer by using an external monitor.
sentences.chinese: 我決定換回我那較新點兒的電腦在外接個顯示屏。

sentences.english: Your weapons are also triggered by a pair of on-screen buttons.
sentences.chinese: 通過顯示屏上的一對按鈕操控你的武器。

sentences.english: Yet its large TFT display is a feast for the eyes.
sentences.chinese: 然而，它的大TFT顯示屏真是讓人大飽眼福。

sentences.english: I put it on her computer screen.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我粘在她的電腦顯示屏上了。

sentences.english: The plate-shaped transparent member overlies a display screen.
sentences.chinese: 板狀透明構件疊加在顯示屏上。

sentences.english: Dynamic VFD display screen enables to control temperature at your options.
sentences.chinese: 動感VFD顯示屏，隨心調控生活每一度。

sentences.english: Other screen is the rev counter which is fixed on the steering wheel.
sentences.chinese: 另一個顯示屏是速度表，安裝在方向盤上。

sentences.english: Ok. What about the LCD and the Mouse? Don't tell me they are all Korean made.
sentences.chinese: 那你的液晶顯示屏和鼠標呢？別告訴我都是韓國產的。

sentences.english: I switch off and so on, only the micro-display light shine, I am sitting in the dark vol.
sentences.chinese: 我關掉等，唯有顯示屏的微亮光芒，我卷坐在黑暗裏。

sentences.english: All the in -coming flights are listed on thar board.
sentences.chinese: 所有的到達航班已在顯示屏上列出。

sentences.english: Railway stations nationwide will also do the same adjustment if they have a ticket display screen.
sentences.chinese: 全國其它有剩餘票額顯示屏的車站也將進行這一調整。

definition: tablet computer (iPad, Android devices etc)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
